mapper.sql: PKID, PROPERTY_CODE, PROPERTY_AGENT_ID, PROPERTY_ADDR,CTM_ADDR, CASE_CODE, TOTAL_FLOOR, PROPERTY_TYPE, LOCATE_FLOOR, SQUARE, FINISH_YEAR, CTM_CODE, DIST_CODE
mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO (PKID, PROPERTY_CODE, PROPERTY_AGENT_ID, PROPERTY_ADDR, CTM_ADDR, CASE_CODE, TOTAL_FLOOR, PROPERTY_TYPE, LOCATE_FLOOR, SQUARE, FINISH_YEAR, DIST_CODE, CTM_CODE, COMMENT, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{propertyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propertyAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propertyAddr,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{ctmAddr,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{propertyType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{locateFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{square,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{finishYear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{distCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, GETDATE(), @{SESSION_USER_ID}, GETDATE(), @{SESSION_USER_ID})

GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID}
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO
PROPERTY_CODE = #{propertyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY_AGENT_ID = #{propertyAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY_ADDR = #{propertyAddr,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CTM_ADDR = #{ctmAddr,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_FLOOR = #{totalFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROPERTY_TYPE = #{propertyType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
LOCATE_FLOOR = #{locateFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SQUARE = #{square,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
FINISH_YEAR = #{finishYear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CTM_CODE = #{ctmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
DIST_CODE = #{distCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(), UPDATE_BY =@{SESSION_USER_ID}
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO set PROPERTY_CODE = #{propertyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY_AGENT_ID = #{propertyAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY_ADDR = #{propertyAddr,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CTM_ADDR = #{ctmAddr,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_FLOOR = #{totalFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROPERTY_TYPE = #{propertyType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, LOCATE_FLOOR = #{locateFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SQUARE = #{square,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, FINISH_YEAR = #{finishYear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CTM_CODE = #{ctmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIST_CODE = #{distCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIM = GETDATE(), UPDATE_BY =@{SESSION_USER_ID} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO set PROPERTY_CODE = #{propertyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY_AGENT_ID = #{propertyAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY_ADDR = #{propertyAddr,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CTM_ADDR = #{ctmAddr,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_FLOOR = #{totalFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROPERTY_TYPE = #{propertyType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, LOCATE_FLOOR = #{locateFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SQUARE = #{square,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, FINISH_YEAR = #{finishYear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DIST_CODE = #{distCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTM_CODE = #{ctmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIM = GETDATE(), UPDATE_BY =@{SESSION_USER_ID} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT PROPERTY_ADDR,CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE IN ( SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE LEADING_PROCESS_ID= #{leadingProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT DISTRICT_CODE, BUILD_END_YEAR, BUILD_SIZE, FLOOR, TOTAL_FLOOR FROM sctrans.vi_HM_HouseDelBase where HOUDEL_CODE=#{property_agent_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.PARENT_ID as orgId,t.ORG_NAME as orgName,t.ID as orgParentId from sctrans.SYS_ORG t where t.ID=#{depId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
